Class GraphCanvasSelectionModel

public class GraphCanvasSelectionModel
extends Object

Selection model used in a GraphCanvas.

public OpNode getSelectedNode()
Gets the selected node.

Returns:
the selected node, or null if getSelectedNodes().length != 1

Parameters:

getSelectedNodes

public Collection<OpNode> getSelectedNodes()
Gets the list of selected nodes.

Returns:
the collection of selected nodes

setSelectedNodes

public void setSelectedNodes(Collection<OpNode> newSelection)
Sets the nodes to select. If a specified node is not a member of the graph specified by this model, it is not selected.

Parameters:
newSelection - the new collection of nodes to select, or null to clear the selection

addNodeToSelection

public void addNodeToSelection(OpNode node)
Adds a node to the selection, if it isn't already selected.

Parameters:
node - the node to add

removeNodeFromSelection

Remove a node from the selected nodes, if it is selected.

Parameters:
node - the node to remove

removeNodesFromSelection

public void removeNodesFromSelection(Collection<OpNode> nodes)
Remove a collection of nodes from the selection.

Parameters:
nodes - the node to remove
